message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can't beat this offer!
That's a bit too skewed towards you, Bob!
I'll give you a bit more, but not that much!
I'll try to squeeze out a better deal, stay patient!
Not much of a squeeze, Bob!
I'll meet you in the middle, but don't expect any more!
I'll make one more push, let's see if you'll crack!
